companies.name: Pigeon
companies.description: Document collection made fast, easy, and secure
companies.hiring_description:
We are a fast-growing, tight-knit company enabling businesses and professionals to securely collect information from their clients in an easy and intuitive manner. We provide an end-to-end document transfer solution that streamlines the document transfer workflow for businesses in every industry.

### Team
We are a team of 4 who previously worked at Google, Deloitte and Kirkland and Ellis.

### Funding Status
We closed a $3.5M Seed round that will enable us to scale our team and provide 3+ years of runway. Prior to this, we received Pre-Seed funding from Y Combinator as part of the Winter 2023 batch.

### About our Technology:
Our Stack:

- AWS, Kubernetes, Vercel
- Python, Flask, SqlAlchemy
- NextJS, Javascript/Typescript, React, CSS, Tailwind
companies.one_liner: Document collection made fast, easy, and secure

jobs.title: Founding Full Stack Software Engineer (NYC Only)
jobs.description:
We are looking for a talented, motivated and self-starting backend/full-stack engineer to join the Pigeon team and work with us out of our beautiful Midtown office. You will be the first engineering hire, which means you will help shape our stack, processes and culture. If you are driven, take pride in your work and want to be part of building the next innovative SaaS product, Pigeon would love to chat with you!

### Why you should join our team

* Impact: Your work will directly impact our customers. You will be building the core features for our users that will help shape their business processes.
* Culture: You will help shape how we work on a day-to-day basis and inform core values as we grow.
* Leadership: You will be placed in a key leadership position as our company continues growing.
* Learning: You will be encouraged to experiment with new methods and technologies to enable new experiences for customers.
* Vision: You will help design and implement Pigeonâ€™s vision.

### Qualifications

* 5+ years experience as a full stack or backend developer
* Experience with REST API development
* Able to work in a fast paced early startup environment
* Able to take full ownership of projects including scoping, system design, implementation, QA, deployment, and maintenance
* Strong communication and collaboration skills
* **Nice to have:**
  1. Prior startup and/or SaaS experience
  2. Experience with encryption and transfer of data
  3. Experience with any part our stack

### Our Stack

* AWS, Kubernetes, Vercel
* Python, Flask, SqlAlchemy
* NextJS, Javascript/Typescript, React, CSS, Tailwind

### Benefits:

* Healthcare (Medical, Vision, and Dental)
* OneMedical
* 401(k)
* Unlimited PTO
* Fully-stocked Kitchen
* 16â€ Macbook Pro (M2 Chip)
* Free Pigeon Merchandise (shop.pigeondocuments.com)
jobs.interview_process:
1. 30 minute conversation with a founder
2. Take home assessment
3. Interview with full team

founders.founder_bio: CEO & Founder at Pigeon (YC W23) in NYC. Ex-Google Data Scientist. University of Chicago '18 B.S. Mathematics and Statistics.
founders.past_schools: BS, Mathematics And Statistics at University of Chicago
Political science at University of Oregon; Talmudic law at The Heiden Institute of Jerusalem; JD at Harvard Law School

companies.name: Wordware
companies.description: IDE for Building AI Agents with Natural Language Programming
companies.hiring_description:
# Join Wordware (YC S24)

- Building an IDE for Natural Language Programming â€” [wordware.ai](http://wordware.ai)
- Sign up for free using this link: [app.wordware.ai](http://app.wordware.ai)

- Main Tool for Millions of AI Engineers coming to the market in the next 5 years
- Repeat founders with exits, in ML for the last 10 years
- **Real Traction:** 3000 MAUs + a bunch of SMB contracts (99-500 per month per seat) + 2 enterprise customers (100k ARR + 80k pilot potential going to 900k ARR)    
- **Product + Community Led Growth**
- **Already funded** (we raised pre-YC at 25mm valuation) **â€” we wonâ€™t do a major pivot or fold on you** â€” weâ€™ve been building this for over a year and are getting more excited every day.
****

note: we're in hustle mode. we're shipping as fast as we can. this is not the kind of job you can cruise and 9-5. only apply if u want to grind, work late nights, and be part of a generational company. **We are an onsite company (SF), expect a big house where the founders live, free food, beers and cool team activities.**

## So we are here, you are looking for a job at a startup huh?

**â‰ï¸ Whatâ€™s it going to be like â‰ï¸**

In Shackleton's famous words: â€œPeople wanted for hazardous journey. Low wages, bitter cold, long hours of complete darkness. Safe return doubtful. Honour and recognition in the event of success.â€

- Why tho?
    
    Risk + Excitement + Hard Work == Startup. Sure, you could join a big company and make decent money but it's that constant thrill of hope, the addictive energy that makes Robert and I come back to startups over and over again ðŸ˜µâ€ðŸ’«
    
    To thrive here, youâ€™ve got to embrace this delulu universe, where the victories give us hope and the failures make us want it even more. Yes, we work late hours and often deal with some bullshit, but you'll be part of something bigger and even more you will have a direct impact on EVERYTHING.
    
    If you're ready to roll up your sleeves, identify your own features to build, and find your own problems to solve, then come on in. Grab a beer and a slice of pizza, and dive into creating the future of natural language programming and AI agents. Together, we'll revolutionize the way we work. Green Light. ðŸŸ¢
    

## So what is Wordware?

*[**Wordware](https://wordware.ai/)** is a prompt-first programming language that can be used by non-developers ([AI Engineers](https://www.latent.space/p/ai-engineer)). We merge concepts like loops, logic and functions from the world of classical programming with the non-deterministic nature of Language Models. Itâ€™s exposed in a web-hosted IDE with features like sharing, forking and API deployment.*

*[Sign up](https://app.wordware.ai/)* â€” try the onboarding flow

Try some prompts:

1. ReAct Agent â€” https://app.wordware.ai/r/8e8b46b3-8643-4eac-9bc3-b9907ae67f36
2. Make a personal website research agent â€” https://app.wordware.ai/r/e3d4e2d6-07c5-49d7-8522-0d53cd7021d2


## Traction and Team
    
- **Traction:** We recently closed a paid partnership with 7000 employees enterprise for 80k (3 months), moving to 1MM ARR if successful + 1 smaller enterprise client. We also have paying SMB clients ($99-500 per seat per month) and 3000MAUs in the community.
- **Team:** *Weâ€™re product-first builders with a track record of shipping ML for the last ten years.*
- *Weâ€™ve worked with LLMs since BERT and GPT-2 and created well-performing stacks before MLOps was a term.*
- *We both have had exits in the field, with Robert being one of the first engineers at FiveAI (acquired by Bosch for 1xx MM) and Filipâ€™s companies raising collectively 10MM.*
- *We met 10 years ago at Cambridge University and worked as full-time co-founders for the last 2.5 years through highs and lows (last project made 360k ARR)*
    

## Come work with us

**If a position you would find interesting is not above don't worry.** If you love what we are doing reach out to me anyway ( founders [at] [wordware.ai](http://wordware.ai) ). Ideally, mention how would you improve our company and try to do it before the application even starts. Or build something using [app.wordware.ai](http://app.wordware.ai). Just be proactive! We are busy! **If you think you are fucking excellent just drop me your LinkedIn.**

We will reach a decision within 14 days and normally pay you for your work if we go through some trial during that time.

Also, join our [discord server](https://discord.com/invite/6Zm5FGC2kR) and share something you built with Wordware!
companies.tech_description:
- Full-stack Typescript, Next.js, React and SST serverless on AWS/Cloudflare
- Using TipTap as the core of our IDE with Y.js for collaboration
- PartyKit (Cloudflare Durable Objects) for Y.js websockets and likely for future orchestration of pipelines
- Open source LLMs hosted by Together AI (weâ€™re a customer story on their website) + Groq + OpenAI/Anthropic/Mistral/Google/Cohere/Perplexity for proprietary LLMs
companies.one_liner: IDE for Building AI Agents with Natural Language Programming

jobs.title: Founding Engineer
jobs.description:
### **What You'll Do:**

* _Engineering Leadership_: Craft the architecture and establish technical standards that will set the tone for years to come.
* Full-stack Coding: You'll be writing a lot of codeâ€”balancing speed and technical debt to get us to market fast and efficiently.
* DevOps Mastery: Own the CI/CD pipeline, troubleshoot performance, and keep our services running seamlessly.
* Product Vision: Collaborate with customers to refine use cases and lead us towards impactful features and enhancements.
* UX flows: Sometimes when you canâ€™t get a hold of us you might have to run with your own intuition.
* Customer Support: Engage with our community in Slack and Discord to resolve issues and gather invaluable feedback.

### **Your DNA:**

* Ideally, you have been a founder in the past or want to become one straight after this position.
* _Technical Excellence_: With 4+ years of engineering experience, you can architect systems, reason through complexity, and build reliable products.
* _Ownership and Initiative_: You eagerly take the lead and run projects to completion, leaving a mark across engineering, culture, and the broader organization.
* _Adaptability and Versatility_: Whether switching hats across engineering, product, and support or solving ambiguous challenges, you're up for it all.
* _Pace and Passion_: Thrive in the chaos of a startup, ready to put your code in production and see it succeed.

### **Tech Stack:**

* **Full-stack**: Typescript, Next.js, React, SST serverless on AWS/Cloudflare
* **Core IDE**: TipTap with Y.js for collaborative editing
* **Orchestration**: PartyKit (Cloudflare Durable Objects) for Y.js WebSockets
* **LLM Integration**: Open source and proprietary LLMs via Together AI, OpenAI, Anthropic, Mistral, Groq, Google, Cohere, and Perplexity
* More cool **ML** optimisation projects that we canâ€™t talk about yet â€” think Grammarly for prompting
* [Read more here.](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/collaborative-llm-prompting-with-wordware)

At Wordware, you'll shape not only our product but your own career trajectory, opening doors to future roles such as founder, CTO, or architect. If you're ready to lay the foundation of something remarkable, let's connect.
jobs.pretty_location_or_remote: San Francisco, CA, US / Palo Alto, CA, US / Mountain View, CA, US

jobs.title: Junior/ Founder's Associate
jobs.description:
We're looking for someone with **high agency**. Your goal will be to deliver results with a lot of independence, but with just enough guidance provided.

What you'll work on will be dynamic and may change every week, but you'll need to be unstoppable in getting your small handful of priorities accomplished quickly.

The more important question is, how will you work?

Being great at something (and here we're talking about the 99th percentile) requires working smart and hard.

You're going to work harder than you ever have. You'll work alongside the best team you've ever worked with, and you'll create the greatest work you can possibly create. You'll do the right things and achieve extraordinary results, but it will require an extraordinary amount of work. Extreme people get extreme results, and that's what we're aiming for.

However, it will be really fun.

At the very least, you'll see what a great team, product, and process look like.

People who join us come to find out how good they are and to show it in a way that canâ€™t be denied. The remaining question is whether you're ready for the challenge?\
\
Feel free to reach out directly to Kamil (if you're the right fit, you'll find a way).

founders.founder_bio:
Robert Chandler is a founder & CTO at Wordware. 

He started his career as an early engineer at a self-driving car startup, Five AI, which was acquired by Bosch. Here he lead the Offline Perception team which accelerated the dev-test cycle through automated ground truthing and was awarded 5+ patents in the process.

He has been in the AI space for over a decade since studying Information Engineering at the University of Cambridge.
founders.past_schools: Master of engineering, Information And Computer Engineering at University of Cambridge

founders.founder_bio:
Cofounder and CEO at Wordware -- an IDE for Natural Language Programming and Agent Orchestration. Previously I cofounded and exited KRISTALIC, which tried to augment the human memory. Before that, I studied Deep Learning at Cambridge. 

The most interesting fact about me outside of work is that I travelled to 103 countries and was part of multiple high-altitude mountaineering rescue operations in Kyrgyzstan and Nepal. I also do sailing, paragliding, kitesurfing and boxing.
founders.past_schools: Master of engineering, Information And Computer Engineering at University of Cambridge

companies.name: Vista
companies.description: Enable role-based access across customer groups
companies.hiring_description: Vista is a managed platform for companies to easily grant/restrict user access on their application. We are best used for: 1) enabling role-based workflows, 2) creating custom roles per customer, 3) managing customer data within internal tools. We provide an end-to-end solution, from frontend React components to APIs and support tools for maximum engineering efficiency and cross-functional collaboration.
companies.one_liner: Enable role-based access across customer groups

jobs.title: Founding Engineer
jobs.description:
Vista is looking for a founding engineer to help build our MVP. We are AI-powered product description data processing/enhancement tool, starting with the auto parts industry. We're funded by top investors, have recently gone through a pivot, and are looking for someone who's excited to join on the ground floor. 

Looking for someone scrappy with 5+ years of experience in engineering, 2+ years building in AI. Experience/domain expertise in the automotive space is highly preferred. 

We are a remote team that's able to sponsor US visa for the right fit.
jobs.interview_process:
We're looking for a product driven engineer with a strong sense of ownership. As with any early stage startup, our value proposition is being scrappy and moving fast, with an emphasis on great cross functional communication. Our interview process is designed to find these types of engineers. 

30 minute phone screen (overview of past experiences, getting to know you more, etc.)
45 minute interview with CEO (in-depth whiteboarding/ problem solving session)
1 hour technical interview with CTO

Please email tina@govista.io for any questions

companies.name: Kodo
companies.description: Corporate card & spend management platform for Indian startups
companies.hiring_description:
Kodo is a corporate card for startups and new economy businesses in India.

Our mission is to empower businesses to scale new heights by using our products. Our first product is a corporate card with an integrated expense management tool.

We believe that repetitive financial tasks should be automated so that founders can focus on building their business and doing what they love. Our products use the best of technology and the financial ecosystem to take over the boring financial tasks that suck up a founder's time.
companies.tech_description:
Current Tech Stack:
- Full-stack TypeScript
- Node.js + NestJs on the backend
- Ionic.+ Angular on the frontend (PWA)
- AWS
- Postgresql

Future Tech Stack:
you'll shape it!

We process card payments and reliability is of utmost importance.

We obsess about providing delightful user experiences to those who are tired of traditional finance apps.
companies.one_liner: Corporate card & spend management platform for Indian startups

jobs.title: Software Engineer, DevSecOps/SRE/Infrastructure
jobs.description:
As a Software Engineer, you take ownership of projects, learn, and work collaboratively with your colleagues. You constantly design, test, evolve and evaluate the nuts and bolts of our operation while offering a creative and analytical approach.

As an infrastructure specialist, youâ€™re passionate about empowering resilience of running systems, rapidly delivering capabilities to the end consumers, reducing costs, and accelerating innovation â€“ primarily through automation of tasks and processes. You love to simultaneously roll-up your developer sleeves and put on your operatorâ€™s hat to ensure service availability, scalability, and resilience.

We believe that DevSecOps is a practice and not a role, and youâ€™ll play a key role in establishing and nurturing the DevOps and InfoSec culture within the engineering team.

What youâ€™ll be doing
================
â€¢ Ensure that our applications and environments are stable, scalable, secure and performing as expected.

â€¢ Proactively engage and work in alignment with cross-functional colleagues to understand their requirements, contributing to and providing suitable supporting solutions.

â€¢ Develop and introduce systems to aid and facilitate rapid growth including implementation of deployment policies, designing and implementing new procedures, configuration management and planning of patches and for capacity upgrades

â€¢ Observability: ensure suitable levels of monitoring and alerting are in place to keep engineers aware of issues.

â€¢ Establish runbooks and procedures to keep outages to a minimum. Jump in before users notice that things are off track, then automate it for the future.

â€¢ Automate everything so that nothing is ever done manually in production.

â€¢ Identify and mitigate reliability and security risks. Make sure we are prepared for peak times, DDoS attacks and fat fingers.

â€¢ Troubleshoot issues across the whole stack - hardware, software, applications and network.

â€¢ Manage individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables as part of a self-organizing team.

â€¢ Learn and unlearn every day by exchanging knowledge and new insights, conducting constructive code reviews, and participating in retrospectives.


You Must Have
============
â€¢ 1+ years extensive experience of Linux server administration include patching, packaging (rpm), performance tuning, networking, user management, and security.

â€¢ 1+ years of implementing systems that are highly available, secure, scalable, and self-healing on Azure cloud platform

â€¢ Strong understanding of networking, especially in cloud environments

â€¢ Prior experience implementing industry standard security best practices, including those recommended by Azure

â€¢ Proficiency with Bash, and any high-level scripting language.

â€¢ Proficiency with Infrastructure as Code and Infrastructure Testing, preferably using Pulumi.

â€¢ Hands-on experience in building and administering VMs and Containers using tools such as Docker/Kubernetes.

â€¢ Excellent communication skills, spoken as well as written, with a demonstrated ability to articulate technical problems and projects to all stakeholders.


Extra credits for
============
* Experience with these technologies:
  * Pulumi with TypeScript or Golang
  * Node.js
  * Kubernetes
  * Serverless infrastructure.
  * AWS especially migration from AWS to Azure  
  * Experience in governance processes and compliance validation, especially for financial services.
  * Experience working in product startups.
  * Experience in administering and scaling PostgreSQL

jobs.title: Software Engineer, Frontend/Full-stack
jobs.description:
Where you fit in
============
As a Software Engineer, you take ownership of projects, learn, and work collaboratively with your colleagues. You constantly design, test, evolve and evaluate the nuts and bolts of our operation while offering a creative and analytical approach.

The high-quality code that stems from your fingertips is robust, readable and understandable. Your pragmatic test coverage allows you to confidently and responsibly practise continuous refactoring.

As a frontend specialist, you love to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Youâ€™re at home writing reusable and extensible components, and you display an intricate understanding of how each line of code fits into a business plan.


What youâ€™ll be doing
================
â€¢ Design, build and evolve our user interfaces to support customer-facing and internal features, while proactively incorporating best practices for UX, security, and analytics.

â€¢ Push the boundaries of whatâ€™s possible on the web and mobile to build delightful and safe experiences for our customers.

â€¢ Collaborate with designers, product managers, stakeholders and cross-functional colleagues to drive a feature from conceptualization to deployment.

â€¢ Contribute to tools, workflows, and culture to ship code from your laptop/workstation to production frequently and confidently.

â€¢ Practise Behaviour Driven Development to collaborate and Test Driven Development to ensure high code quality.

â€¢ Manage individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables as part of a self-organizing team.

â€¢ Learn and unlearn every day by exchanging knowledge and new insights, conducting constructive code reviews, and participating in retrospectives.


You Must Have
============
â€¢ At least **5 years** of professional web development experience.

â€¢ A profound understanding of HTML, CSS, JS including the latest trends and best practices.

â€¢ 3+ years cross-platform, responsive, mobile-first apps using component-oriented architecture, using Angular 2+ preferably else React.js is fine too

â€¢ Proven ability to write clean and SOLID code using **Typescript** or **ES2019+**, applying appropriate object-oriented and functional programming design patterns.

â€¢ Well-versed with writing DAMP unit and functional tests that are readable and robust.

â€¢ Excellent communication skills, spoken as well as written, with a demonstrated ability to articulate technical problems and projects to all stakeholders.


Extra credits for
============
â€¢ Experience with these technologies:
â—¦ Ionic framework w/ Capacitor or Cordova
â—¦ Apollo GraphQL client.
â—¦ Push Notifications.
â—¦ Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
â—¦ Gherkin syntax and Cucumber for behaviour specifications

â€¢ A background in UI/UX and graphic design.

â€¢ Ability to contribute in other parts of the stack - backend, devops, test-automation, etc

â€¢ Experience in financial services or fintech.

â€¢ Experience working in product startups.

jobs.title: Product Marketing
jobs.description:
About Us:
Kodo is a Y Combinator backed financial technology startup that helps Indian companies simplify payments through a control based technology stack that issues corporate credit cards and solves for vendor payments through UPI & bank transfers.

Kodo is a corporate card and spend management platform for some of the fastest growing Indian startups and enterprises. Our product is loved by companies such as Groww, Zepto, Mobikwik, Fampay, Epigamia, Blue Tokai, Mahindra Logistics & any more. We have raised $14M from investors such as YC Continuity, Brex, Goat Capital and other Silicon Valley investors. We believe in creating exceptional products for our customers, an enriching environment for our team, and a solid business that grows profitably. 

Job Title: Product Marketing Manager
Location: Pune or Mumbai, India
Reports To: CEO

Summary:
We are looking for a self-motivated and experienced Product Marketing Manager to join our growing fintech company in India. This is a newly created role, and you will be responsible for building and driving the product marketing strategy for our B2B spend management solution. You will work closely with the CEO and other members of the team to develop and execute go-to-market plans, create compelling messaging, and generate leads and sales.

Responsibilities:
Develop and execute a product marketing strategy for our B2B spend management solution.
Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify opportunities and position the product accordingly.
Create compelling messaging and content that resonates with our target audienc.e
Develop and manage go-to-market plans for new product launches and feature releases.
Work with sales and customer success teams to generate leads and close deals.
Track and measure the results of product marketing campaigns.

Qualifications:
3+ years of experience in SaaS product marketing, preferably in the B2B space.
Strong understanding of the product marketing lifecycle, from go-to-market strategy to launch execution.
Experience in developing and executing marketing campaigns across multiple channels.
Excellent writing and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Bonus Qualifications:
Experience in the fintech industry.
Experience with B2B lead generation and sales.
Experience with marketing automation tools.


Note: We are looking for a self-starter who can drive this newly formed department. Therefore, it is important that the candidate is proactive, independent, and has a strong track record of success.
jobs.pretty_location_or_remote: Mumbai, MH, IN / Pune, MH, IN

jobs.description:
About Us:
Kodo is a Y Combinator backed financial technology startup that helps Indian companies simplify payments through a control based technology stack that issues corporate credit cards and solves for vendor payments through UPI & bank transfers.

Kodo is a corporate card and spend management platform for some of the fastest growing Indian startups and enterprises. 5+ years of experience in developing backend systems using Kotlin, Micronaut, Spring Cloud, or other similar technologies
Strong understanding of unit testing and TDD
Experience with DDD (domain-driven design), CQRS, Clean Architecture, Hexagonal Architecture, Microservices, Multi tenancy and Event Sourcing is a plus

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with Docker and Kubernetes

jobs.title: Sales Development Rep
jobs.description:
**About Us:**

Kodo is a corporate card and spend management platform for some of the fastest growing Indian startups and enterprises. Our product is loved by companies such as Groww, Zepto, Mobikwik, Fampay, Epigamia, Blue Tokai, Mahindra Logistics & many more. We have raised $14M from investors such as YC Continuity, Brex, Goat Capital and other Silicon Valley investors. We believe in creating exceptional products for our customers, an enriching environment for our team, and a solid business that grows profitably.Â 

**Location: Mumbai**

**Roles & Responsibilities:**

* Sound knowledge on solution selling in the technology or product domain,
* Source new sales opportunities through extensive research (Jobsites/Google/Tools).
* New client acquisition/daily-lead generation, cold calling and pitching solutions
* Sourcing new sales opportunities in industry segments like Enterprise/Mid- market/Startups through extensive research from internal database as well as tools like [Intricately.com](http://Intricately.com), LinkedIn Sales Navigator and other data and technology profiling tools.
* Creating a database of prospective clients and validating the information by understanding the requirements and proposing the right solutions.
* Interacting with C-Level executives (CTO, CEO, Founders, and Presidents) through effective communication leveraging calls and emails.
* Building and maintaining strong relationships with all potential and existing clients.
* Consistently maintaining and expanding your database of prospects.
* Assessing client requirements and routing qualified opportunities to the appropriate BDMs for further development and closure.

**Requirements**

Max 3 yrs of experience in Lead generation in B2B SaaS companyÂ 

Exceptional written, verbal, phone and presentation skills

Full Time Graduate or Post graduate

Self-motivated and driven to plan and execute sales generation

Commitment to exceed targets

Able to build good working relationships across all levels

Able to work in a team and independently

**Benefits**

Performance-based bonuses.

Vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays.

A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it.

Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place.

If you are a passionate and driven sales professional with a strong background in B2B enterprise sales, we encourage you to apply. Join our dynamic team and contribute to the growth and success of our B2B fintech company.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

jobs.title: Account Executive
jobs.description:
**About Us:**

Kodo is a corporate card and spend management platform for some of the fastest growing Indian startups and enterprises. Our product is loved by companies such as Groww, Zepto, Mobikwik, Fampay, Epigamia, Blue Tokai, Mahindra Logistics & many more. We have raised $14M from investors such as YC Continuity, Brex, Goat Capital and other Silicon Valley investors. We believe in creating exceptional products for our customers, an enriching environment for our team, and a solid business that grows profitably.Â 

**Location: Mumbai**

**Roles & Responsibilities:**

Responsibilities:

1\. Conducting Product Demonstrations and Presentations:

* Conduct compelling product demonstrations tailored to prospective clients' specific needs and challenges.
* Deliver persuasive sales presentations showcasing Kodoâ€™s solutions and their direct relevance to client requirements.
* Clearly articulate Kodoâ€™s value proposition, highlighting unique selling points during client interactions.

2\. Understanding Client Requirements:

* Collaborate closely with the SDR team to understand client needs identified during the prospecting phase.
* Conduct thorough needs analysis discussions with potential clients to deeply understand their challenges and goals.
* Translate client requirements into customized solutions, addressing pain points effectively during presentations.

3\. Deal Negotiation and Closure:

* Lead negotiations on contract terms, pricing, and service agreements to secure new business deals.
* Consistently achieve and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets through strategic selling and relationship-building.

4\. Client Relationship Management:

* Cultivate and maintain enduring relationships with clients by deeply understanding their business goals and objectives.
* Regularly follow up with clients to gauge satisfaction levels, identify opportunities for upselling, and promptly address concerns.

5\. Market Feedback and Collaboration:

* Gather market feedback during client interactions and collaborate with the product and marketing teams to enhance Kodoâ€™s offerings.

Requirements:

* Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business, Marketing, Sales, or related field.
* At least 1 to 3 years of relevant experience
* Proven track record of successful B2B sales in the SaaS industry, consistently meeting or exceeding sales targets.
* Exceptional communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
* Strong consultative selling skills, ability to understand client pain points, and propose tailored solutions.
* Experience with CRM software and sales-related tools.
* Self-motivated, results-driven, and ability to work independently as well as in a collaborative team environment.
* Adaptability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic startup environment.

**Benefits**

Performance-based bonuses.

Vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays.

A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it.

Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place.

If you are a passionate and driven sales professional with a strong background in B2B enterprise sales, we encourage you to apply. Join our dynamic team and contribute to the growth and success of our B2B fintech company.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

jobs.title: React Native Developer
jobs.description:
Job Title: Associate/Software Engineer (Frontend)

Location: Pune

Experience: Minimum 3 years in React Native development\*\*

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:

About Us:

Kodo is a Y Combinator backed financial technology startup that helps Indian companies

simplify payments through a control based technology stack that issues corporate credit

cards and solves for vendor payments through UPI & bank transfers.

Kodo is a corporate card and spend management platform for some of the fastest growing

Indian startups and enterprises. Our product is loved by companies such as Groww, Zepto,

Mobikwik, Fampay, Epigamia, Blue Tokai, Mahindra Logistics & any more. We have raised

$14M from investors such as YC Continuity, Brex, Goat Capital and other Silicon Valley

investors. We believe in creating exceptional products for our customers, an enriching

environment for our team, and a solid business that grows profitably.

We are seeking an experienced React Native Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal

candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience in developing

cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. As a React Native Developer, you will

be responsible for designing and implementing high-performance, scalable, and

maintainable mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.

Responsibilities:

\- Develop and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using React Native.

\- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other

developers, to deliver high-quality software solutions.

\- Write clean, well-documented, and efficient code.

\- Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize application performance.

\- Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure the best possible

performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.

\- Work closely with the UI/UX design team to implement user interfaces that match the

design specifications.

Requirements:

\- Minimum of 3 years of professional experience in React Native development.

\- Strong proficiency in JavaScript and its modern ES6+ syntax.

\- Experience with state management using Redux or similar libraries.

\- Solid understanding of mobile development concepts and best practices.

\- Experience with native modules and bridges for deep integrations with native code.

\- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and GraphQL.

\- Knowledge of mobile app deployment processes for both iOS and Android platforms.

\- Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.

\- Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.

\- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

\- Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.

\### Bonus Skills:

\- Familiarity with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

\- Knowledge of testing frameworks such as Jest or Detox.

\### Education:

\- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is

preferred.

\### Benefits:

\- Competitive salary.

\- Health, = insurance.

\- Professional development opportunities.

\- Collaborative and innovative work environment.

If you are a skilled React Native Developer with a passion for creating high-quality mobile

applications, we invite you to apply and join our team. Please submit your resume, portfolio,

and any relevant code samples along with your application.

jobs.title: Business Development Associate
jobs.description:
**Job Description**

We are seeking an energetic and results-oriented Business Development Associate to play a pivotal role in our growth strategy. This position demands strong leadership skills, proactive problem-solving abilities, and excellent communication skills.

**Responsibilities:**

1\. Conduct engaging online product demos via platforms like Google Meet/Zoom, tailoring presentations to meet specific customer needs and address queries effectively.

2\. Initiate outbound calls to identify potential customers from leads, implementing follow-up procedures to nurture leads and convert them into active customers.

3\. Manage the end-to-end customer onboarding process, ensuring a seamless transition from sales to product utilization.

4\. Develop and maintain strong customer relationships, providing ongoing support and understanding customer needs.

5\. Maintain detailed records of all sales activities, customer feedback, queries, and interactions using CRM tools for accurate and up-to-date information.

6\. Provide insights into customer preferences and market trends to inform marketing initiatives.

7\. Report customer feedback, suggestions, and market insights for continuous improvement.

8\. Proactively contribute to the development of sales strategies to achieve business objectives.

**Qualifications:**

1\. Internship or full time experience in business development, sales, or a related field.

2\. Good Communication skills with confidence in presenting and demonstrating products to potential customers.

3\. Strong interpersonal skills for effective relationship management.

4\. Demonstrated ability to suggest product improvements based on customer needs.

**Skills Required**

1\. Candidates must speak **Hindi & English** fluently

We are growing very fast and are closing in on our target of **$1M ARR** excited to have more talented people join us in this rocket ship

**Location:** Hyderabad

jobs.title: Sr. Android Developer (Kotlin)
jobs.description:
Swipe is a Simple billing and payment for 75M+ Indian SMBs. We are backed by Y-Combinator and top-tier VCs and Angel Investors from Silicon Valley and India. We make it easy for local businesses to invoice their customers over WhatsApp. With Swipe, businesses can send a WhatsApp message with a link that allows their customers to pay instantly with a variety of payment methods. We are growing 10x year over year and with that growth we need your help in maintaining that growth.

The ideal candidate should have a minimum of one year of work experience and should have developed 1-2 apps that are currently available on the Play Store.

**Qualifications**

- 2+ years Experience building Android Apps
- 1-2 Apps you have built should be on Play Store 
- Expertise with KOTLIN, XML
- Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services
- Experience with Firebase is a plus (FCM, analytics)
- Understanding of Androidâ€™s design principles and interface guidelines


**Roles & Responsibilities**

- Working closely with founders to develop and maintain the app and build out product features at a rapid pace.
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
- Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
- Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
- Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
- Contribute to product development by pitching in with ideas and doing proof-of-concepts.

jobs.interview_process:
Our comprehensive iOS hiring process involves:

1. Initial Screening: Applications undergo scrutiny to evaluate qualifications and alignment with our needs.
2. Technical Assessment: Candidates complete a practical iOS assignment demonstrating relevant skills in app development.
3. 2-3 Interviews: Shortlisted candidates participate in 2-3 interviews gauging technical aptitude, culture fit, and teamwork.
4. Job Offer: Outstanding candidates are extended job offers, welcoming them to our team's dynamic and innovative journey.

jobs.title: Performance Marketing Specialist
jobs.description:
**Who we are:**

Swipe is a simple billing and payments app for 75M+ SMBâ€™s in India which is backed by Y Combinator and top-tier VCs and Angel Investors from Silicon Valley and India. We make it easy for local businesses to invoice their customers over WhatsApp. With Swipe, businesses can send a WhatsApp message with a link that allows their customers to pay instantly with various payment methods.

**What weâ€™re looking for**

* We're seeking a Performance Marketing Specialist who is a doer, creative, analytical, scrappy, humble, and based in Hyderabad (or willing to relocate) with skills in digital advertising, PPC, Paid Acquisition, and a passion for data-driven strategies.
* 3+ years of hands-on experience in driving performance marketing (must-have) and other growth channels, at a product company.
* Ability to create and implement data-driven marketing campaigns. Strong leadership qualities, including decision-making, empowerment, and team motivation.
* Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Adwords).
* Ability to manage a large budget with aggressive targets
* â€‹â€‹Numerically literate, comfortable working with numbers, making sense of metrics, and processing figures with spreadsheets.

**What you will do:**

* Lead and support the implementation of our paid marketing strategies
* Manage, optimize & maximize the company's ROI across channels
* Track, analyze, and interpret brand marketing channel ROI by setting channel-specific CPA, LTV, ROAS KPIs and design dashboards tracking the efficacy of marketing efforts and communicate results to drive decision-making
* Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with business goals.
* Apply a product-led growth approach to drive user acquisition, engagement, and retention.
* Develop and optimize acquisition channels, creating new strategies as needed, including Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and Meta Ads.

We are growing very fast and are closing in on our target of **$1M ARR** excited to have more talented people join us in this rocket ship

[Swipe](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/swipe-2#news) is a billing and payments app for 75M+ SMEs in India which is backed by Y Combinator and top-tier VCs and Angel Investors from Silicon Valley and India. * Conduct product walkthroughs and guide customers in utilizing our app to ensure a seamless onboarding experience.
* Handle customer complaints and escalations empathetically and professionally, striving to resolve them efficiently.

* Develop and maintain strong customer relationships, providing ongoing support and understanding customer needs.
* Collaborate closely with the sales and product teams to offer valuable insights derived from customer interactions.
* Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, feedback, and resolutions using CRM tools for continuous improvement.
* Provide insights into customer preferences and market trends to inform marketing initiatives.

**What weâ€™re looking for**Â

* You are customer-obsessed and genuinely care for customers.
* Strong problem-solving abilities and the ability to remain calm under pressure.
* A team player with a willingness to collaborate across departments.
* We are growing very fast and are excited to have more talented people join us on this journey

We are growing very fast and are closing in on our target of **$1M ARR** excited to have more talented people join us in this rocket ship.

companies.name: OneText
companies.hiring_description:
We're two former leads from the PayPal Checkout team (engineering & product), we just got pre-seed funding for our new startup which we launched earlier this year, and we're looking for an engineer to join us!

Our goal is simple: to make it possible to use your phone number to pay, anywhere and everywhere, with zero friction. We have a ton of cool ways to make that work, and a bunch of brands already using our platform.

Email: hello@onetext.com

Our stack:

Front-end: JS/TS/React

API: Node/TS/Postgres/Redis

Services: Shopify/Twilio/PayPal/Stripe/Authorize.net

What we do: payments, vaulting, automated conversations, and merchant-facing dashboards. Plus a whole load of interesting things in-between.

Most important skill: be able to communicate well, and learn quickly. Doesn't matter if you haven't used every technology listed above, so long as you're a fast learner and happy to jump quickly into new things.

Experience level: any. So long as you can code, if we like you and you're a good fit, we'll find a role for you.

Expectations: it's a startup, and we just got accepted into YCombinator 2023. So it will be busy, there's no avoiding that. But we want to create a great engineering culture that fosters innovation, learning, and mentorship. We want to teach, and we want to learn from you too.

Location: we're both CA (bay area), open to remote anywhere in US, may be able to make non-US work with some kind of contracting role but priority given to US-based folk.

Salary: completely dependent on experience and skill. Equity on the table. (Apologies for being vague here. Our plan is to create the role and compensation around the candidate we think is the best fit)

https://bluepnume.medium.com/you-dont-know-jack-about-sms-ce68304c3d5c

https://bluepnume.medium.com/subscriptions-are-out-refills-are-in-311fd6e41e5e

https://bluepnume.medium.com/dtc-brands-have-a-huge-blind-spot-vaulting-13ea7ef5b2f

Send us an email about yourself!

jobs.title: Lead UX Engineer for OneText: Y Combinator W23 fintech startup, with former PayPal leads
jobs.description:
We're two former leads from the PayPal Checkout team (engineering & product), did Y Combinator in 2023 and closed our seed funding round for our startup OneText. We're looking for a lead UX Engineer to join us and completely redefine our user experience!

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer (React)
jobs.description:
Tempo Labs is revolutionizing the way designers and developers collaborate. We're building an AI-powered visual IDE for React that bridges the gap between design and code. Our mission is to help anyone with an idea ship production-grade software 10X faster.

## Job Overview

As a Front-End Engineer at Tempo Labs, you will play a pivotal role in shaping our product. Your focus will be on developing intuitive, high-performance web applications within our AI-powered visual IDE. You'll collaborate with a cross-functional team, contributing your technical expertise to create seamless experiences for designers and developers.

## Key Responsibilities

* Design and implement robust front-end solutions for our visual IDE, optimizing for performance and scalability.
* Work closely with UX/UI designers to translate design concepts into functional code.
* Contribute to the development lifecycle, including coding, testing, debugging, and deployment.
* Ensure high-quality graphic standards and brand consistency.
* Stay updated with emerging front-end technologies and methodologies, integrating them to enhance our platform's capabilities.

## Qualifications

* Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
* Proven experience as a Front-End Developer or similar role, preferably in tech or startup environments.
* Expertise in front-end technologies, including JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and frameworks like React.js, and tailwind.
* Experience with responsive and adaptive design principles.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with a knack for bridging the gap between technical and non-technical teams.

## What We Offer

* The opportunity to be part of an innovative, fast-growing startup.
* A collaborative, flexible, and supportive work environment where your contributions directly impact the product's success.

## How To Apply

Please read ALL of the job requirements and complete the google form linked below if you believe yourself to be a good team fit.

<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScmwXxQtSd1FFFCAwHm9jM0qGtjaS-zIONXNj7OznXolhRsFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>

Spent the last 5 years as founding engineer and head of product at Perpetua ($150M exit). Previously product fellow at Social Capital and engineer on the Visual Studio team at Microsoft.

I've tried every low-code tool on the market and not a single one does a good job integrating with existing production codebases. I'm obsessed with solving this problem at Tempo and using AI to turn anyone into a 10X engineer.

companies.name: Yoneda Labs
companies.hiring_description: Yoneda Labs provides software to help chemists optimise reactions. When chemists make a drug or a material, we help them figure out the best reaction parameters such as temperature, concentration and catalyst.

jobs.title: Organic Chemist
jobs.description:
**Organic Chemist**

At Yoneda Labs, we use state-of-the art lab automation to run hundreds of organic chemical reactions a day. Using this experimental dataset, we plan to create an AI model that will be able to predict high-yielding reaction condition for organic reactions without any wet-lab experimentation.

We are looking for an experienced organic chemist who would:

* Plan the reactions - substrate scope and reaction conditions
* Design controls
* Work with the robots to execute the experiments
* Analyze the reactions on HPLC-MS
* Help with running the lab overall

**About us & What we offer**

We are an early stage startup - currently a team of 3 friends in their 20s with backgrounds in Chemistry and Computer Science - and we hope to build datasets and models that will revolutionize how organic synthesis is done.

Apart from a fast-paced startup environment, we offer an interesting job on the intersection of Chemistry and Data-Science in a well-funded lab. As we are a small team without strongly defined structure, you will be able to work on what youâ€™re the best at without any unnecessary internal meetings or reports, helping to define the direction and success of the company.

### **Skills & Qualifications**

As a candidate, you should:

* Have extensive experience with working in an organic chemistry lab
* Be able to work independently, and pro-actively solve any (unexpected) experimental problems

It is beneficial, although not at all necessary, to:

* Have experience with synthetic reactions commonly used in medicinal chemistry, namely metal-catalyzed cross-couplings such as Suzuki or Buchwald-Hartwig
* Know how to use and maintain HPLC-MS
* Know Python

founders.founder_bio:
MichaÅ‚ is the Co-Founder and CEO of Yoneda Labs.

MichaÅ‚ studied Computer Science at the University of Cambridge. He has strong software engineering and Artificial Intelligence experience having worked at Jane Street and Berkeley AI Research.

founders.founder_bio:
Jan is the Co-Founder and Chief Scientist at Yoneda Labs.

Jan studied Chemistry & Biology at the University of Cambridge. Has worked at Bayer and as a research chemist for institutes in Czechia and Austria. He has a lot of experience designing ML models to solve problems in Chemistry and Biology, most notably he designed and sold a model for cell segmentation. He scored 8th/10th/11th at the international Chemistry Olympiad.
founders.past_schools: BA, Chemistry, Molecular Biology, Statistics at University of Cambridge

founders.founder_bio:
Daniel is the Co-Founder and CTO at Yoneda Labs

Daniel studied Computer Science at the University of Cambridge. He has strong software engineering experience having been a software engineer at Cisco, Optiver and a programming languages researcher at the University of Cambridge. 

He won first place at the international robotics competition Pi Wars, and ranked 5th in the Cambridge Computer Science cohort.

companies.name: Dioxus Labs
companies.description: Web, Desktop, and Mobile apps with one codebase in Rust
companies.hiring_description:
Dioxus is on a mission to rethink cross-platform app development using Rust. We're developer-focused, open source, ambitious, and get to work on deep technical problems.

We're directly taking on Flutter, React Native, and the native toolkits (Apple, Google).

Our open source repo has nearly 20,000 stars on GitHub and we've been part of the Github Accelerator and presented at numerous conferences.
companies.tech_description:
We're all-in on Rust. You should also be pretty multi-lingual - there's lots of random nuggets of TypeScript, JavaScript, Java/Kotlin, C#, and C/C++ floating around.

We get to do actually fun and hard stuff, like custom linkers, mobile tooling, UI designers, backend services, IPC, websockets, proc-macros, etc.

Dioxus is also a contributor to Rust itself, so if you want to just generally make Rust better, this is a great avenue. Most things we do are open source and we have a great community that you'll get to interact with.
companies.primary_vertical: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
companies.one_liner: Web, Desktop, and Mobile apps with one codebase in Rust

jobs.title: Founding Rust Engineer
jobs.description:
Work on _actually_ hard problems with massive ownership and huge reach.

Dioxus is looking to hire its first fulltime in-person Rust engineer in San Francisco.

Weâ€™re looking for a â€œ[cracked](https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Cracked)â€ Rust engineer whoâ€™s not intimidated by complex systems and unfamiliar domains. Youâ€™re the perfect candidate if you feel comfortable writing web services, diving into linkers, coding microcontrollers, exploring AI, and staring at the W3 specifications for hours on end.

Our current team is made up of similarly cracked engineers: our side projects include AI Metaframeworks, plasma physics simulations, from-scratch RC airplanes, and homebuilt web browsers(!!).

Our office is literally my old apartment - itâ€™s cozy, sunny, in a safe area, and you get to sit next to me while we bang out the next year of features. Youâ€™d be the first fulltime in-person employee, so the experience will be much closer to a founding engineer than a corporate drone.

Our current projects include binary patching Rust, a linker-based asset system, a deploy platform, server-side HTML streaming, local-first AI finetuning, a TUI devtool, and rendering Firefoxâ€™s CSS engine with WGPU.

Ideally you have a good sense of API design and an eye for polish. Our CLI is literally called `dx` - developers are at the core of our design! Our docs are generated by proc macros!

This is an in-person role - youâ€™re free to work on a beach for a week (team offsite?!) but the typical week will involve a healthy dose of startup grind. Please, keep your weekends full of fun.

Read more about us:

[http://github.com/dioxuslabs/](http://github.com/dioxusLabs/)

[http://github.com/dioxuslabs/dioxus](http://github.com/dioxusLabs/dioxus)

<http://dioxuslabs.com>
jobs.interview_process:
* Youâ€™ve built something youâ€™re proud of. Explain it to me! Talk about the problems you solved, the things you didnâ€™t know, what youâ€™d add, and more.
* Show me your favorite frameworkâ€™s API and why you think itâ€™s great. How would you improve it? How would it compose?
* Talk about yourself.
* A takehome.
* Technical interviews with founder friends.

jobs.title: React Native Developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a great JavaScript developer who is proficient with React Native. Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them. You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different features of the product. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important.


Responsibilities
Developing cross-platform user-facing features using React Native 

Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use

Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code

Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers


Skills
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model

Thorough understanding of React Native and its core principles

Experience with popular React Native workflows 

Familiarity with RESTful APIs
Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token

Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
A knack for benchmarking and optimization

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description:
As a Software Engineer at Groww, you will be working on advanced technologies, creating user-friendly solutions, applying algorithms and data structures and solving problems.


Your everyday work will involve participating in design and architecture discussions with other members of the team. This, we believe, is the best way to learn about our software systems, best practices and standards in the industry. You are also expected to contribute back by asking questions and by helping the team arrive at decisions.


Your work will primarily involve converting the proposed design, interfaces and architectures into Services and Applications. Much of this implementation will be on top of databases: creating data access layers and implementing Application programming interfaces (APIs).


You will be the owner of the product you will be working on, right from the implementation, testing, product demo, and production deployment, to the monitoring of the application.
